title: Cooking Fails
itunes:title: Cooking Fails
description:
In this episode, Bobby & Sophie recount the horror stories of epic cooking fails. For starters, we learn why a young Sophie disliked a dish so much that Bobby had to take it off of the menu at one of his restaurants. We also hear the story behind Bobby's most brutal burn from a New York Times review. And of course, Bobby show's Sophie exactly how to make lobster mac and cheese from scratch.

For more information on "Always Hungry", follow the hosts on Instagram:

Bobby Flay's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bobbyflay

Sophie Flay's Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/abc7sophie


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
